FDA approves Dengvaxia¬Æ for the prevention of dengue in individuals ages 9 through 16 living in U.S. endemic area


http://www.news.sanofi.us/2019-05-01-FDA-approves-Dengvaxia-R-for-the-prevention-of-dengue-in-individuals-ages-9-through-16-living-in-U-S-endemic-areas



BRIDGEWATER, N.J., May 1, 2019 /PRNewswire/ -- The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approved Dengvaxia¬Æ (Dengue Tetravalent Vaccine, Live) for the prevention of dengue disease caused by serotypes 1 ‚Äì 4 of the virus in individuals 9 through 16 years of age living in endemic areas of the U.S. with a laboratory-documented prior infection. Dengvaxia is the first and only vaccine approved for protection against dengue in endemic areas of the U.S.

Dengue virus ( Arbo virus family ) has mainly 4 serotypes (5th one not isolated ) . Majority of the time when you get reinfected along with a different serotype then only you have higher chances of developing DSS or DHF . Btw dengue also have Saddleback fever pattern meaning biphasic fever with an initial peak that remits and appears again after some days like what we have seen in many cases of covid .

Hum Lymphatic filariasis ke liye massage, yoga aur compression methods ko milakar ek treatment protocol develop kiya hain. Aapko 14 ya 21 days ka treatment IAD mein hum dhenge, baad mein aap yeh treatment ghar mein chalu karna hain. Hello Shahana,

Lymphoedema 2 tharah ke hote hein: Primary aur Secondary. Yadhi Maa ko Primary Lymphoedema he tho disease baby ko bhi ho sakta hein. Ye pregnancy ke time me ya bachcha 10-15 years hone ke baad (Puberty mein) ho sakta hein. 

Lekin, yadhi Maa ko Secondary Lymphoedema ya Filariasis he tho disease baby ko nahi hoga. Filariasis sirf active period mein machchar se hi pheyl sakta he.

Zyaada jaankari ke liye humare treatment experts se baath ki jiye. Phone: 04994240862, 04994240863, 09895588735

Hello ma'm,

Lymphoedema occurs due to damage of the lymphatic vessels. There is dilatation of lymph vessels and normal contractibility is lost (lymphatic vessels carry lymph; its damage causes improper drainage that results in oedema/swelling). Our treatment procedures result in the drainage of lymph, possibly through collateral circulation. As is the case in heart diseases and diabetes, lymphoedema is also not completely curable but we have observed that, following treatment, control of infection and a significant reduction in swelling occurs due to which the patient can return to normal activities. For best results, Lymphoedema/Filariasis patients have to be on long term and often life-long treatment.

The triple therapy contains Tab Albendazole 400 mg, Tab Diethyl carbemazine citrate 300 mg and tab Ivermectine 9 mg, usually used to kill the parasite, which is widely distributed in endemic areas of lymphatic filariasis
In IAD, a combination of medications according to to the symptoms will be prescribed by the dermatologist.  If it is needed ivermectin will also be prescribed.

Filariasis causes lymphedema also known as Elephantiasis i.e swelling of the limb. When the swelling is long-standing, the limb gets secondarily infected by bacteria and fungi. This condition (lymphatic filariasis) is caused by a parasitic worm - Wucheria bancrofti, Brugia malayi and Brugia timori are the 3 worms.
They are spread via mosquitos (like malaria).
There is no cure for this condition, but prevention of infection should be emphasized.

Water pills can remove the fluid but increases the protein concentration of the lymph fluid, so it is not recommended to take water pills / Diuretics for Lymphoedema.  
Integrative Medicine is the most effective method to manage Lymphatic filariasis or Lymphoedema, With Integrative Medicine treatment patients can get nearly 80% of reduction in lymph size. 

Limb elevation is practiced routinely for all lymphoedema. However, our research has shown that established lymphoedema has more of connective tissue inside the limb than lymph. Nevertheless, limb elevation is important advice as you pointed out. Although this is not mentioned in the video we do recommend limb elevation to all patients. If you wish to read more on water and connective tissue contents of elephantiasis kindly read our research paper  Arun Kumar Karayi, Vijaya Basavaraj, Saravu R Narahari, Guruprasad Aggithaya, Terence J Ryan, and Rajendra Pilankatta. Human Skin Fibrosis: Up-regulation of Collagen type-III gene transcript in the fibrotic skin nodules of lower limb lymphoedema in Tropical Medicine and International Health (A European journal preprint published)

Filariasis is a parasitic worm nematode Infection not deformity.

Lymphatic Filariais  is caused by microscopic worm that spread from person to person by the bite of infected mosquito. The worm damages the lymph nodes or causes the dilatation of the lymphatic vessels, by which flow of lymph fluid is impaired and cause massive lymphoedema (elephantiasis) of the legs ,arms breast, genital area. The patients usually present with symptoms like painful swelling on the one / both legs, arms & scrotum, along with fever and redness of the affected part. The skin also becomes much thickened and with over hanging folds which can resemble the foot of an elephant. Filariasis is the most common form of secondary lymphoedema worldwid
